price: In that situation[25], the authority only rests with Allah, the True God. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا
footnotes: [25] i.e., on the Day of Judgment.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
